SECRET4BRONZE.description: Configuration table for Bronze Layer DBT Job settings

columns.name: APP_NAME
columns.business_description: Application name identifier for Bronze layer configurations

columns.name: CONFIG_KEY
columns.business_description: Configuration parameter key for Bronze layer

columns.name: CONFIG_VALUE
columns.business_description: Configuration parameter value for Bronze layer job

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.business_description: Human readable description of the configuration parameter
columns.sample_values: DBT Cloud Job ID for Bronze Layer

columns.name: IS_SENSITIVE
columns.business_description: Boolean flag indicating if the configuration value contains sensitive information

columns.name: CREATED_AT
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the configuration record was initially created

columns.name: UPDATED_AT
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the configuration record was last modified

SECRETS_STORE.description: Master secrets and configuration store for all applications - CONTAINS HIGHLY SENSITIVE DATA

columns.name: APP_NAME
columns.business_description: Application name identifier (DBT, GITHUB, etc.)

columns.name: CONFIG_KEY
columns.business_description: Configuration parameter key name
columns.sample_values: Git_Branch, DBT_Base_URL, DBT_API_key, DBT_Account_ID, DBT_Project_name, repo, branch, token, repo_owner

columns.name: CONFIG_VALUE
columns.business_description: Configuration parameter value - CONTAINS SENSITIVE CREDENTIALS AND TOKENS
columns.sample_values: [REDACTED - Contains API keys, tokens, URLs, and other sensitive configuration data]

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.business_description: Human readable description of the configuration parameter
columns.sample_values: GitHub Branch Name, DBT Cloud Base URL, DBT Cloud API Key, DBT Cloud Account ID, DBT Cloud Project Name, GitHub Repository Name, Git Branch for deployment, GitHub Personal Access Token - HIGHLY SENSITIVE, GitHub repository owner for DBT project

columns.name: IS_SENSITIVE
columns.business_description: Boolean flag indicating if the configuration value contains sensitive information

columns.name: CREATED_AT
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the configuration record was initially created

columns.name: UPDATED_AT
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the configuration record was last modified

SECRETS_STORE.security_note: This table contains highly sensitive information including API keys, personal access tokens, and other credentials. Access should be strictly controlled.

metadata_summary.data_classification: HIGHLY SENSITIVE - Contains API keys, tokens, credentials, and configuration data
security_recommendations: Implement row-level security for SECRETS_STORE table
Enable data masking for sensitive columns
Audit access to these tables regularly
Consider encryption at rest for sensitive values
Implement proper access controls and role-based permissions

table_relationships.SECRETS_STORE: Master configuration table containing all application secrets and settings
